question.title: How to compare Notes Item on Type using OpenNTF Domino API?
question.body:
I am applying the OpenNTF Domino API to an existing application.

In my code I get a lot of warnings that the method getType is depricated. I have no idea how to rewrite the code.

The code is as follwed:

if (doc.hasItem("fieldA")) {                
    Item rtiComment = doc.getFirstItem("fieldA");               
    if (null != rtiComment) {                    
        if (rtiComment.getType() == Item.MIME_PART) {   //here I get a warning           
            //more code
        } else if (rtiComment.getType() == Item.RICHTEXT) { //here I get a warning      
            //more code
        }   
    }               
}

I read in the documentation that there is another method getTypeEx() for an Item, but this returns a Type. I Have no idea how to get the type of the Item.MIME_PART because according to the documentation that returns an integer.

What am I misunderstanding and what should I adapt to my code to be able to compare the Item and get rid off all the warnins that I get?

Thanks+Much appreciated!
